selection_policy.rule: If one measurement remains after selecting the best mode OR all remaining are within tolerance_ms for the same mode, set scalar to median; else unk with conflicting_sources_unresolved.

ui.label: Click Latency
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Click Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Click Latency (By Mode)
ui.tooltip_md: Click latency values by mode when available. Rare; do not guess. Structured list preferred: e.g., '1.1 wired, 1.3 wireless'.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Coating' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Colors
ui.tooltip_md: Colorway tokens. Use list<string>. Normalize greyâ†’gray; multi-colorways may use '+'.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Computer-side Connector' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Connection
ui.tooltip_md: Primary connection mode (wired/wireless/hybrid/bluetooth). Prefer manufacturer docs.

ui.label: Connectivity
ui.tooltip_md: Connectivity options (e.g., 2.4GHz, Bluetooth, USB). Use list if multiple.

ui.label: Max DPI

ui.tooltip_md: Sensor model (component DB-backed). Must be evidence-backed; avoid wrong-variant merges.

ui.label: Sensor Brand
ui.tooltip_md: Sensor manufacturer brand (e.g., PixArt). Prefer component DB if sensor identified.

ui.label: Sensor Date
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Date' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

selection_policy.rule: If deterministic selection is possible (single mode + within tolerance), set scalar; else unk.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Wireless Charging' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

boolean_yes_no_unk.description: Parse yes/no/true/false variants into boolean, else unk.

component_reference.description: Resolve component names against component DB aliases/canonical names.

date_field.description: Parse date strings into normalized precision-aware format.

enum_string.description: Parse string values with enum alias normalization.

integer_with_unit.description: Parse integer numeric value with unit normalization.

latency_list_modes_ms.description: Parse mixed latency measurements into structured list entries {mode, ms}.

list_numbers_or_ranges_with_unit.description: Parse mixed numeric sets and ranges with optional unit conversion.

list_of_numbers_with_unit.description: Parse list of numeric values sharing one unit.

list_of_tokens_delimited.description: Parse token list separated by known delimiters.

number_with_unit.description: Parse scalar numeric value with unit normalization.

string.description: Pass-through string parser with trimming and missing-token handling.

text_field.description: Parse plain text fields with trim + whitespace normalization.
